books.author: by Robert M. Edsel with Bret Witter
books.description: The fight to preserve art works stolen by the Nazis during World War II. The basis for the movie.
books.name: THE MONUMENTS MEN

books.author: by Marcus Luttrell with Patrick Robinson
books.description: The only survivor of a Navy SEALs operation in northern Afghanistan describes the battle and his escape. First published in 2007; the basis for the movie.
books.name: LONE SURVIVOR

books.author: by Robert M. Gates
books.description: The former defense secretary recounts his experience serving Presidents Bush and Obama during the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.
books.name: DUTY

books.author: by Solomon Northup
books.description: The narrative, first published in 1853, of a freeman who was kidnapped and sold into slavery, and spent 12 years in bondage before escaping; the basis of the recently released movie.
books.name: TWELVE YEARS A SLAVE

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of "The O'Reilly Factor" recounts the events leading up to Jesus' execution.
books.name: KILLING JESUS

books.author: by Elizabeth Kolbert
books.description: The New Yorker writer examines the role of man-made influences in causing plant and animal loss.
books.name: THE SIXTH EXTINCTION

books.author: by Charles Krauthammer
books.description: Three decades’ worth of essays from the conservative columnist.
books.name: THINGS THAT MATTER

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of "The Tipping Point" and "Outliers."
books.name: DAVID AND GOLIATH

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail during the summer of 1995.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Brandi Glanville with Leslie Bruce
books.description: Observations on hooking up, from the “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” star.
books.name: DRINKING AND DATING

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Jonathan Allen and Amie Parnes
books.description: An account of Hillary Clinton’s years in the State Department.
books.name: HRC

books.author: by Sheryl Sandberg with Nell Scovell
books.description: The chief operating officer of Facebook urges women to pursue their careers without ambivalence.
books.name: LEAN IN

books.author: by Brian Kilmeade and Don Yaeger
books.description: The story of the Culper spy ring, which aided the American cause during the Revolution.
books.name: GEORGE WASHINGTON'S SECRET SIX

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL
